note: I am a fantasy/sci-fi artist inspired by the traditional illustrators of the 20th century, particularly those who worked on Dungeons & Dragons in the late 80s and early 90s. I try to use digital brushstrokes to build up images with a feeling of mass and weight reminiscent of illustrations painted alla prima in oil, and I like to focus on a character's face, posture, and overall physical attitude before the costume and accessories.
